function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Residual energy consumption in net-positive buildings during lockdown periods","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Basal energy use due to inefficiency and organizational culture","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Basal energy use attributed to
